Router¶

class hive.router.DefaultRouteEngine(timestep_s, rn_scaling_factor, dispatch_mph)[source]¶

Default routing engine for hive.

Using a calculated road network scaling factor and an average driving speed, the engine produces a scaled ‘as the crow flies’ path between the two points.

Parameters

  • timestep_s (int) – The amount of seconds that each time step represents.

  • rn_scaling_factor (float) – The calculated road network scaling factor

  • dispatch_mph (float) – The calculated average driving speed

class hive.router.OSRMRouteEngine(server, timestep_s)[source]¶

Wrapper for OSRM routing engine.

This engine expects that an OSRM server is running and that the address is given through the server argument.

Parameters

  • server (string) – The https address of the OSRM server.

  • timestep_s (int) – The amount of seconds that each time step represents.
